text: School Tip   Get rid of distractions before they become distractions The biggest obstacle to doing well in school is distractions To overcome distractions  you can t depend on willpower  Few of us have the willpower necessary to fight off all the distractions that surround us in this digital era Here are some ways to eliminate distractions before they become distractions Turn off notifications on your phone tablet Put your phone tablet in another room before you start work Restrict your Internet access Have only one tab open in your browser at any one time Find an accountability partner as you make these changes
summary: The biggest obstacle to doing well in school is distractions. Turn off notifications on your phone tablet, put your tablet in another room before you start work, restrict Internet access, have only one tab open in your browser at any one time and find an accountability partner.
cleaned: big obstacle school distraction turn notification phone tablet tablet room start work restrict internet access tab open browser time find accountability partner
